title: Continuous Optimization
description: Fundamental algorithms and duality concepts of continuous optimization. Motivation, applicability, information requirements and computational cost of the algorithms is discussed. Practical problems will illustrate the power of continuous optimization techniques.
antirequisites: Antirequisite(s): SFWRENG 4TE3 . Not open to students in a Software Engineering or Mechatronics Engineering program
schedule: Three lectures, one tutorial (one hour); one term
